com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.dialog

Class QueryFieldModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.dialog.QueryFieldModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryModel

    public class QueryFieldModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryModel
    An implementation of QueryModel representing a single text query field.

    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com
